Henri Marius Germain Baudrand

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/7627294438897299
  • Última atualização do currículo em 04/04/2014

Henry Baudrand, Professor Emeritus at the Ecole Supérieure d Electronique Electrotechnique Informatique, ENSEEIHT, of National Polytechnic Institute of Toulouse, France is specialized in Modeling of Passive and Active Circuits and Antennas. He is the author and co-author of three books: Introduction au calcul des éléments de circuits micoondes. Optimisation des circuits non linéaires. (in collaboration with M.C.E. Yagoub). Calcul des circuits microondes par les schémas équivalents.(in collaboration with H.Aubert.) These books are published by CEPADUES Editions Toulouse. He is editor of New trends and concepts in microwave theory and technics ,Research Signpost 2003. He co-signed over 150 publications in International Journals, four chapters in Scientific Books and 250 communications in International Conferences. He is Fellow Member of IEEE Society, Fellow Member of Electromagnetism Academy and Senior Member of IEE society. He was President of URSI France commision B for 6 years (1993-1999), President of IEEE-MTT-ED French chapter (1996-1998), and President of International Comity of O.H.D.(Hertzian Optics and Dielectrics) beetwen 2000 and 2004. He is awarded Officier des Palmes académiques and Doctor Honoris causa of lasi University (1996). (Texto informado pelo autor)
